name: Lab Rabbit
description:
Lab rabbit is a multiplayer game where 1 player is an AI that can create spikes, explosions and activate traps, while the rest are little rabbits in a metal suit that are trying to survive.
You can play with 2 players, but 3 or more are strongly advised.

You get points and experience by surviving as a rabbit. You can buy new skins with points, and unlock new skins with experience. Skins change your rabbits look and are visible for everyone.

The player that makes the room is the destroyer. Once he leaves, the room is done for. The max amount of players right now is 20. Dont overload the servers please.

Controls: 

Rabbits: A D and space.

Destroyer: Left click to spawn spikes, Right click to create a fiery explosion. Click on traps to activate them. NOTE: Traps have a pretty long cooldown.
